content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0-6, y=0-4)
Consists of multiple furnaces for smelting iron:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0)
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) 
- Stone furnace at position(4,4)
- Stone furnace at position(6,4)
Current status: No ingredients to smelt

###Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to 4.5, y=21.5-27)
Steam-based power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) - working, producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler - contains water
- Boiler at position(-2.5,24) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine at position(4.5,24.5) - not connected/no input liquid
- Connected electric poles at positions(2.5,24.5) and (6.5,24.5)

###Inserter Production Line (Position x=20.5-26.5, y=2.5)
Automated inserter assembly setup:
- Input chest at position(20.5,2.5) 
- Burner inserter at position(21.5,2.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at position(23.5,2.5) - currently no power
- Burner inserter at position(25.5,2.5)
- Output chest at position(26.5,2.5)

###Research Lab Network
Multiple labs connected to electricity network 142188:
- Several labs with partial automation/logistic science packs
- Some labs with no research in progress
- Two labs without power connection

ERROR TIPS

### Power system connection errors
- Ensure steam engine is properly connected to power network
- Make sure boiler has constant fuel supply
- Verify fluid connections between boiler and steam engine are complete

### Assembly line power issues
- Connect assembling machines to power network
- Ensure consistent power supply through proper pole placement

### Resource shortage errors
- Keep adequate iron plates in inventory before attempting to craft items
- Maintain coal supply for boilers and burner inserters
- Pre-craft required sub-components before attempting to make complex items

### Crafting errors
- Items requiring smelting (like iron plates) cannot be directly crafted - must use furnace
- Ensure all recipe ingredients are available before starting assembly

### Inventory management
- Monitor coal levels for burner devices
- Keep track of component materials needed for automated assembly
